rukus.text: Nahnu Naqussu `Alayka Naba'ahum Bil-Haqqi 'Innahum Fityatun 'Amanu Birabbihim Wa Zidnahum Hudaan
Wa Rabatna `Ala Qulubihim 'Idh Qamu Faqalu Rabbuna Rabbu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Lan Nad`uwa Min Dunihi 'Ilahaan Laqad Qulna 'Idhaan Shatataan
Ha'ula' Qawmuna Attakhadhu Min Dunihi 'Alihatan Lawla Ya'tuna `Alayhim Bisultanin Bayyinin Faman 'Azlamu Mimmani Aftara `Ala Allahi Kadhibaan
Wa 'Idh A`tazaltumuhum Wa Ma Ya`buduna 'Illa Allaha Fa'wu 'Ila Al-Kahfi Yanshur Lakum Rabbukum Min Rahmatihi Wa Yuhayyi' Lakum Min 'Amrikum Mirfaqaan

Wa Tara Ash-Shamsa 'Idha Tala`at Tazawaru `An Kahfihim Dhata Al-Yamini Wa 'Idha Gharabat Taqriđuhum Dhata Ash-Shimali Wa Hum Fi Fajwatin Minhu Dhalika Min 'Ayati Allahi Man Yahdi Allahu Fahuwa Al-Muhtadi Wa Man Yuđlil Falan Tajida Lahu Waliyaan Murshidaan
